resources.string: Write these words down and keep them safe. Do not lose these words or forget your passphrase.
Show extended public key for an account.
Securely erase this wallet from the device.
Remove Samourai from the launcher and home screen. You must dial **YOUR_PIN_CODE# from the phone dialer to launch Samourai.
Choose your exchange and local fiat currency.
The block explorer used to view transaction details.
Send SMS to a trusted mobile number when the SIM card is changed.
Use trusted mobile number for remote
Only allow remote commands sent from your trusted mobile phone number.
A trusted mobile number that you can restrict remote access to (use int\'l format without spaces ex.: +447385555555).
Get SHA-256 hash of this installed APK file (can be copied to clipboard).
Define alternative PIN for stealth launch and remote functions.
Periodically save passphrase encrypted backup to device storage.
Spends will use BIP126 for increased obfuscation.
Specify your own trusted node for broadcasting transactions.
Use trusted node for broadcasting transactions.
Spends will use RBF (replace-by-fee) to enable fee bumping.
Verify wallet access and backup support.
Verify wallet access and backup support.
Send wallet backup to tech support. Does not contain private key info.
Send wallet backup to tech support? Does not include any private key, seed, or passphrase info.
Are you sure you want to exit Samourai?
Your Samourai Wallet device now has a different SIM card corresponding to incoming number of this text message.
Create a PIN code between 5 and 8 characters.
No Internet connectivity. Please try again.
Please create a passphrase and keep it secret. You will need this passphrase if you lose access to your wallet.
Please confirm your passphrase. Keep it secret. You will need this passphrase if you lose access to your wallet.
Enter your mnemonic (or hex entropy) and, if necessary, your BIP39 passphrase. If you do not use a BIP39 passphrase, leave it blank.
Your wallet must use a passphrase. Please try again.
Passphrase does not match. Please try again.
Do not use any space characters in your passphrase. Please try again.
Wallet passphrase verified OK. Would you like to test decryption of the latest auto backup?
Testing decryption of passphrase protected backup file. Please wait.
BIP39 passphrase verified OK and backup file decrypted successfully.
You have used this address before! Reusing addresses may result in a loss of privacy.
Samourai does not handle transactions over 100KB in size. Please try splitting your transaction.
Copy this receive address to the clipboard? If copied, it may be visible to other applications.
Share this receive address? If shared, it may be read to other applications.
Are you sure you want to erase this wallet?
Privacy warning: be aware that you have already sent funds to this address.
Use scrambled numerical pad to enter your wallet.
You must have Orbot installed and activated to proxy traffic through it. Would you like to install it from Google Play?
SSL certificate pinning has failed. This might indicate malicious activity. Please verify your network connection and device before continuing.
We are unable to connect to the host to verify the SSL certificate. Please verify your network connection and device before continuing.
Receive addresses are only generated for your Samourai account.
This is your Shifted Account. The Bitcoin you receive through ShapeShift will be stored in this account which does not share the same address space as your primary wallet account.
There was an error while encrypting your wallet backup. Please try again.
There was an error while decrypting your wallet backup. Please try again.
Backup found on device. To restore from existing backup, tap \'OK\', otherwise copy/paste different backup and tap \'OK\'.
Samourai Wallet cannot be run on this device
Are you sure you want to change your PIN?
Are you sure you want to create an alternative PIN to be used for stealth launch and remote commands?
You are not using any alternative PIN code for stealth and remote functions.
Wait for stealth launch mode to fully activate before defining an alternative PIN code.

Your payment code is reusable and unique to your wallet. Press the QR code icon in the top right to share your payment code.\n\nWhen your payment code is added a payment channel will be opened allowing payments into your wallet at anytime.
Add a payment code by pressing the \'+\' icon on the bottom right.\n\nAdd a payment code to open a payment channel. Once the channel is open you can send through it at any time.

The payment code for donating to Samourai will be prefilled on the next screen. Normally, you would need to enter this by scanning a QR code or pasting from your clipboard.

If you choose to continue a payment channel will be created with Samourai and you can choose to donate whenever you feel like it.

If you prefer to end here without adding your first payment channel to Samourai press 'Close'. You are ready to start using payment channels at any time.
will be deducted from your wallet balance in order to create the payment channel on the block chain.
Scan or paste a payment code to create a new payment channel.
Notification transaction sent. Your payment channel is being created.
You must supply a label for this payment code
Add a payment code to send bitcoin anytime without sharing or reusing addresses.
Share your payment code to receive payments without sharing or reusing your addresses.
Cannot scan your own payment code
This payment code is already in your list.
Sign message using BIP47 notification address private key?
Signed using my BIP47 notification address.
This payment channel is waiting for 1 confirmation before sending is activated. Would you like to discard the previous attempt and resend a notification?>
The incoming transaction is replace-by-fee. View in block explorer?

Your wallet is not protected by a passphrase. Wallet backups are encrypted using your wallet passphrase. If you would like to use encrypted wallet backups and other Samourai Wallet features create your wallet using Samourai Wallet and transfer your funds.
A passphrase is required to use this function. Please consider creating a new wallet which will automatically include a passphrase.
Samourai APIs cannot be reached. Please verify connection and try again or try later.
Samourai APIs are returning an error. Please try again or try later.
The change from this transaction is a dust amount and is being added to the miner\'s fee.
Samourai is not routing via Tor. Tap to activate.
Tap to install Orbot and route Samourai through Tor.
(includes 0.001 BTC fee to Samourai and miners\' fees)?

Ricochet spends will cost a 0.001 BTC fee to Samourai. For improved privacy you can pay this fee via our BIP47 payment code. Before spending via Ricochet, would you like to open a BIP47 payment channel to Samourai?
Do you want to rebroadcast this Ricochet spend?
There was a problem broadcasting your Ricochet. Do you want to rebroadcast this Ricochet spend?
There is no Ricochet to be resent.
There is no Ricochet script to display.
Unable to mask outgoing payment code
Spend failed. Server returned null value.
Please supply valid info for your trusted node.
Trusted node not recognized. Please check installation.
Trusted node is set. Note that Samourai Wallet supports Bitcoin Core 0.13.1 and over.
Trusted node not responding. Please check installation.
Trusted node cannot be set on a bitcoin client that breaks consensus.
This transaction is awaiting confirmation. Please select an option:
Display private key for this bitcoin address? If so, display with caution. Otherwise, choose to view transaction in block explorer.
Cannot retrieve transaction information. Please try again.
Be advised that bumping the fee may not be necessary for this transaction.
Would you like to increase the miner fee of this transaction for quicker confirmation?\n\nAdditional Miner Fee:
The proof-of-work being reported by your trusted node is not verifying. Please check your installation.
Your fee selection is set to:
Set your custom fee in sat/b.
Custom fee is set too low.
Custom fee is set too high.
Cannot make transaction with dust output.
Error reading payload. Please try again.
Sign message using this private key?
Your wallet recovery words and passphrase will be displayed. Do not allow anyone to view your screen. This will NOT be displayed again.
As a reminder, your PIN code is:
